Class TopTradersActivity

extends Activity
    This activity displays the list of top traders using the app

      • getTopTraderAdapter

        public TopTraderAdapter getTopTraderAdapter()

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        This sets the click listener for the list of top traders. Navigates to the profile of the user that was clicked on.

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)

      • onStart

        protected void onStart()
        This initializes the TopTraderAdapter to display the top traders. Loads all users and sorts them based on the number of active and complete trades.

      • getTraderScore

        public java.lang.Integer getTraderScore(User user)
        Calculates the top trader score for a user
        Parameters:
        user - The user to calculate the trader score for
        Returns:
        The number of in progress and completed trades for the user
